metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3732 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: [overlayfs: Mounting overlayfs inside an unprivileged user namespace can reveal files] Alois Wohlschlager discovered that the overlay file system in the Linux kernel did not restrict private clones in some situations. An attacker could use this to expose sensitive information.

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.11.0-38.42').
